item.title: Using randomuser.me for seeding DB in Rails projects
item.description: I was working on a small Rails project and I needed some fake data to seed my DB. Normally, this would haven’t been a problem, but that time I needed profile pictures as well beside the first and last names. My first attempt was faker gem but couldn’t get the result I wanted, so looked around for another solution. There is a great project, called randomuser.me. Using their API you can get random users with names, profile picutures, etc.
